statements: UPDATE Coaches SET game_strategy='Offensive', training_drills='Cardio', performance_evaluations='Good' WHERE coach_id=1;
UPDATE Coaches SET training_drills='Strength training', game_strategy='Defensive', performance_evaluations='Average' WHERE coach_id=2;
UPDATE Coaches SET game_strategy = 'Defensive Tactics', training_drills = 'Fitness Training' WHERE coach_id = 1;
UPDATE Coaches SET coach_name = 'John Doe', performance_evaluations = 'Excellent' WHERE coach_id = 2;
UPDATE Coaches SET strategy='Defensive' WHERE coach_id=1;
UPDATE Training SET drill_name='Passing Drill' WHERE training_id=3;
UPDATE Coaches SET strategy = 'Defensive' WHERE coach_id = 1
UPDATE Training SET drill_name = 'Passing Drills', coach_id = 2 WHERE training_id = 3
UPDATE Coaches SET team = 'Warriors' WHERE coach_id = 1;
UPDATE GameStrategies SET strategy_name = 'Defensive Plays' WHERE strategy_id = 5;
UPDATE Coaches SET team='Manchester United' WHERE coach_id=1;
UPDATE PerformanceEvaluations SET evaluation_score=85 WHERE coach_id=2 AND player_id=3;
UPDATE Coaches SET team_name = 'Team A' WHERE coach_id = 1;
UPDATE GameStrategies SET strategy_description = 'Defensive strategy' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE Coaches SET team_name='Team A' WHERE coach_id=1;
UPDATE TrainingDrills SET drill_duration=60, drill_name='New Drill Name' WHERE coach_id=2 AND drill_id=5;
UPDATE Coaches SET team_name = 'Lakers' WHERE coach_id = 1;
UPDATE GameStrategies SET description = 'Defensive strategy for Finals' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
